title: Kerala Heritage Tour 7
overview: Explore the beautiful heritage attractions of Kerala. This tour is designed to give you an immersive experience of Heritage Spot 7.

itinerary.title: Arrival
itinerary.desc: Arrive in Kerala and transfer to your hotel.

itinerary.title: Sightseeing
itinerary.desc: Full day exploring Heritage Spot 7 and nearby areas.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.desc: Breakfast and transfer to the airport/station.
